reference.title: Edition January 2014, Support Program Release 4.2.10
reference.shortdesc: This edition describes the IBM Basic Services API for Release 4.2.10.

section.p: For Release 4.2.10, changes to the API include the following added support:

ul.li: DEV-ANY (AUTOSELECT) support added via CSUACRA, CSUACRD, environment variable CSU_DEFAULT_ADAPTER, for automatic (simple) load balancing.
key storage support for DES key tokens with Zero CVs.
CEX4C support and recognition for all verbs and utilities.
